formElement.label: LabManager Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for LabManager. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: LabManager Organization:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Organization in LabManager. This must reference an existing Organization in Lab Manager.

formElement.label: LabManager Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The workspace within Lab Manager (required in Lab Manager 4.0 and newer). This must reference an existing Workspace in Lab Manager(default is Main).

formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: A configuration in the Lab Manager library. Provide the name of an existing configuration.

formElement.label: New Library Name:
formElement.documentation: New library name for the captured configuration.

formElement.label: Deployed Results location:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander location to get properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).

formElement.label: Deployed tag:
formElement.documentation: Tag to get the deployed configuration.

formElement.label: Results location:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander location to store resulting configuration properties (default is /myJob/LabManager/deployed_configs).

formElement.label: Results tag:
formElement.documentation: The unique tag for this operation to keep it separate from other operations stored in the same results area.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
